body:
Yeah, that is a problem. @yilei, we do need to maintain backwards compatibility for the behavior of `tf.app.*`. Maybe we need to extend the wrapper to be ugly. 

We should also deprecate `tf.app` and `tf.flags` altogether. They are included for historical reasons, TF has no business containing those modules.
